name: Kicking and Screaming
description:
Player vs Player action game where only one of you will make it out alive.  The machine you and your opponent are lobbing back and forth will explode after 10 hits. Hit it more times than your opponent to sent it in their direction! You also have a last ditch super attack that builds as you hit the machine. Unleash this for last minute saves! 

Supports controllers and microphones! That's right, your mic is also a key component of game play.

Move - Left thumbstick/WASD

Jump - A/Space

Hit - Right Bumper/E

Super hit - Right Trigger/Q/Screaming at the top of your lungs

Restart - R

Made for Philly Dev Night's "Band Name Jam."

Developed by :

Kevin Mai, Ethan Burch, and James Bochanski

Music by Emanuel Whittington
